metadata.dc:author: Ruibal Moldes, M
Duarte Novo, J E
Alvarez Castelo, L
González Martín, M
Patiño, M L
Lancina Martín, A
metadata.dc:description: Presentation of a case report of follicular cystitis in a 48-year old male patient who referred gross haematuria and repeat urinary infections. Ultrasonographic and endoscopic examinations show the presence of a vesical pseudoneoplasm. Definite diagnosis was achieved through histologic study after TUR-biopsy.
metadata.dc:title: Cistitis folicular. Presentación como pseudotumor vesical.
[Follicular cystitis. Presentation as a bladder pseudotumor].
